JOB DESCRIPTION: To succeed in this role, you should have the following skills and experience    At-least 2+ years of relevant software development experience   Strong programming background, OOPs, design patterns and data structures    Hands on experience on spring based micro-services development is a must    Experience in deployment of applications in Cloud Foundry is a big plus    Exposure to Cloud stacks such as AWS is a big plus     Having experience of deploying applications on Cloud platforms is a big plus     Exposure to any Javascript based front-end tech stacks such as Angular, React etc. is a plus but not mandatory     Open to learning new technology stacks at short notice and being able to contribute meaningfully within a short period of time    An interest and preferably working experience in agile development methodologies    A team player, eager to invest in personal and team growth, curious     Strong analytical, conceptual and creative thinking skills. A problem solving and pragmatic attitude
